values:
Soooo lets see, whats new. Not much. I've been working, going to school, playing WoW, and not getting very much sleep. lol But thats alright. I've gotten some cute new clothes. Gonna try to change my style a bit for the summer and get out of so much of the dressy look. Not that I dont like it...cuz I do, but its too hot in the summer to be running around in that sorta stuff. Heres a peak of my new clothes and some more screenshots....

 

My faaaaave pic of Maedran.

My new Alt Trikzy. Ok, shes not that new, shes a lvl 11.

Sooo friggin cute.

Questing in the Wetlands

Sas, Mae, Rian, and Thelia aka me, Ryan, his mom, and his dad before we all headed down to Gnomeregan. Sooo much fun. :)

The beauty of this game never ceases to amaze me.

 

Gryph from Dun Morogh (you can stee the snow at the top of the mountain) to Loch Modan.

Back of my new Roxy shirt

Front of new Roxy shirt and my new white hoodie.

New gray Vans.

New black Vans.

Gah, thos pix came out blurry, i need a new cam lol.

Anyway, thats all thats new w/me. I was on spring break last week and i totally vegged. It was great :) Now I'm gonna go clean up my nasty ass room! w00t!

Alright, its been a while so I suppose it's time for an update :)

I've gotten SO FRIGGIN ADDICTED to World of Warcraft, its rediculous. It's such an amazing game. It's my first MMORPG that I've played and gah...it's awesome. I've had the game for 2 weeks tomorrow and I'm already a level 21. w00t! Of course I've had a ton of help from Ryan. Couldn't have done it without him!

 

Sasharra and Maedran in the Deadmines a couple days ago...

Gnome Sandwich

Hahahahaha

Naked gnome dancing kicks ass.

More will come later :)

I'm such a geek.

This is pretty much all I've done the past couple weeks so not really much to update on. =P

Ive been sooo freakin busy. Its rediculous. February 5th we had our S2k meet @ the Dragon.  I've had to do a ton of work to the sol (brakes, oil change, replacing some studs and MAJOR cleaning). And of course...Vday was monday ;)

I didn't expect to get anything for valentines day. I had been really busy with the sol last week and hadn't talked to Dan and I guess I kind of figured he was moving on.

I went to work on Monday and it was incredibly slow. It sucked so bad. I saw all these guys coming in buying Godiva and carrying Victoria's Secret bags and stuff and it was all in all a bit depressing. Then Dan comes in and I'm like wth?! I didn't know he was coming. He said "let me see your keys" i was like what? why? and Lisa (a woman I work with) was like "shelbie, dont ask just give him your stinkin keys!" So he goes outside and comes back in and we talk for a min and he leaves. I couldn't take it anymore. I lasted maybe an hour before sneaking out to my car to see what he got me. I had a lil teddy bear holding a rose (I swear that was the most perfect rose I've ever friggin seen. I'm drying it in my closet ;) ) and a bunch of candy. It was sweet. He told me later that he went to two different walmarts and Krogers trying to find my fave valentine candy (those little hearts that say stuff like "be mine" and stuff on'em) but he couldn't find any. It was cute though. The best part was I was totally caught off guard. How awesome.

Saturday at the meet went VERY well too. I had a blast. Heres some pics...

This is on our way to the dragon that morning in Knoxville. Pic taken by Jason.

Jason at the Overlook (mouth of the dragon) bout to puke after riding shotgun with Meyer. hahaha good times.

Dad's S2k at the Overlook and Killboy's convertible Mini Cooper S. Pic taken by Killboy.

Just how curvy is the Dragon? Heres Charles ripping it up. Pic taken by Killboy.

Me and dad on the Dragon. Dad's considering ordering this pic poster size from Killboy. Pic taken by Killboy.

S2k in front...

...s2k in the back. :) Thats a kickass feeling.

Looking over the Overlook.

More of the Overlook. I love the Smokies.

All of us together at the entrance to the Foothills Parkway waiting on Charles' girlfriend Jo to meet up with us

Theres also many many more but I think thats enough for now.

Heres some new pics of me from the 13th and 14th...

Theres some more but I'm getting quite pic'ed out. blah. But anyways, thats nuff for now ;)

woohoo! I'm so tired =\ The mini s2k meet is coming along pretty nice.  So far we have 7 S2k's and one M3 coming so it should be a nice ride. Instead of taking a ride on the Blue Ridge Parkway like we had orginally planned we're gonna take a few passes on the Dragon cuz the BRP is closed. bah. Thats ok though. I'm incredibly excited. It should be fun. :)

I did my nails tonight and washed the car. Trying to get everything straight for Saturday. I think we're gonna go to La Carettas and eat and then probably watch a movie.

Jerry called me today. Surprisingly...I had just left school and was heading home and my phone rang. He was all asking how i was and what classes i had that morning and all being friendly and I was being nice but a little short. Then hes like "well i might just have to come a little bit earlier next tues and thus so I can meet you in the parking lot" I didn't say much after that. I still dont understand him. Guess hes having g/f problems.

Last Saturday it snowed about half an inch here. I was at work and when I got off at 9 i went outside and someone had written "Kev" in the snow on my hood. I dont know a Kev. Wth?

Everything is kinda boring right now. Just kinda chillin till this weekend :)

shew, its been a while...

anyway...I'm back in school. My classes so far aren't so bad but tomorrow is friday and friday by far is going to be my shittiest day. I've got class from 8-11 then a class frome 5-10 that night. a FIVE HOUR CLASS! holy hell, its gonna suck so bad. its biology 2. ugh.

Anyway, i've been getting s2k fever again. I found some kickass pix of a few...

 

gah...you can't tell me those aren't hott. I want a GP so bad...gah...

heres some stuff i plan on getting for the sol in the next few months...

along w/Brembo brake pads, and I'll be getting some money to get my clutch replaced, my o2 sensor replaced and some little things like that.

Heres some new pix of me...

theres a few of'em anyway! aight so im getting in bed cuz its getting late =P

I've done absolutely nothing today and its like almost 4. I feel like such a lump...

Theres even things I could do like call my dad or do laundry...ugh.

Izzy left me a message on yahoo saying hes back in town for me to give him a call when I got up today but I've not called...I dont know why I havn't...guess I dont know what to expect. Maybe I'll call him tonight.

Joe hasn't called...was thinking about maybe calling him back tanight too...he probably thinks I dont want to talk to him anymore after how weird I was on the phone the other night...I just needed a couple days.

Dad is probably wondering where the hell I'm at. I've not seen him in a couple days so hes probably spazzing.

I just feel like being lazy...I broke out my ooooold Sims for PC last night and now I'm hooked all over again. Linsey *ahem* needs to hook me up with the Sims 2 like she told me she would. :)

I've been tryin to help Bran with her issues with this guy shes dating now....I dont understand how you can date someone for like 2 weeks and not try to kiss them....ok let me rephrase that, kiss them more than just a quick pop kiss goodbye....whatever. Guys suck. I think we've already established that.

Adam IMed me yesterday but I wasn't here. He told me a few days ago to give him a call sometime. Maybe I'll take him up on that. Who knows?

This guy on Yahoo has been harassing me...I'm scared.

Okay, I think I'm going to go throw some clothes in the washing machine. Joy.

New Years was pretty kewl. Me, Bran, Ryan, and Clayton hung out for a bit but Clayton left early cuz he was sick...the rest of us drank quite a bit, me and Bran especially. I didn't go to work today cuz I had a little bit of a hang over but it wasn't bad. We had fun. :)

Me and Brandi took the kids to the mall and to McD's today. That was fun; they loved it. Collin as we speak is playing GTA Vice City on my PS2 so I think its fair to say the kids have had a good day.

I'm kinda wondering what I should do about the guy situation. I'm not really interested in Clayton anymore, hes pretty much turned me completely off and I think hes noticed this. Joe on the other hand said he'd call me either tanight or last night and hasn't so I dunno whats up with that. I guess i'll try to give him a call tomorrow. We'll see? That does have me kinda wondering. I wonder if Izzy will call me when he gets back? ha.

okay, so I suck.

Clayton apparantly felt like I was trying to tell him when he can see me and somehow felt I was trying to keep him from chilling with his friends which totally wasn't my point.

The real reason I was mad was I thought he felt like he was obligated to do something with me and he was just trying to be a nice guy w/out straight up blowing me off. And I guess I just wanted him to flat out tell me something....so maybe it was my fault.

Okay, it probably was.

So I tried calling him last night, cuz i felt bad about things and wanted to smooth things over but he was out last night w/brandi and ryan at the theater...*sigh* so I guess i'll trying calling one more time but after that im leaving him alone....

Guess we'll see what happens.

I'm beginning to think I'm not suppose to be in a relationship?

Boys hate me :'(

Ya know, I just dont know what I do to deserve such shitty luck with guys. I've been talking to Clayton right? Everything was going great...then Sunday night he calls me and he had been drinking a little but he talked like he was fine. I dunno maybe that had something to do with it, but anyway...he asked me if i wanted to hang out monday night. So of course I was like sure. So I go monday and clean up the house and get all ready and wait for him to call me when he gets off work. Which he does. Only problem was that he had forgotten all a bout seeing me that night and proceeded to apologize profusely. And I honestly think it really was just a mistake. So we talk and decide that since we're both off on wednesday (today) that we would get together. Which duh, of course I assumed we would go out tonight. Isn't that normal? Aren't dates especially first 'real' dates usually at night? Anyway...I find out last night that he wanted to go snowboarding with his friend Wade tonight at like 5 so he lets me know last night that we're gonna have to go out during the day, which just totally bums me. Because I had this picture of us like chilling at my house watching movies and stuff and whatever, date during the day just sucks. He said we could go get some lunch and chill and stuff but i was just so agrivated cuz he had already blown me off accidently then turns around and makes plans on 'our day' without talking to me about it first. I was so pissed. So he said "hey, how bout I call you in the morning when you get up and we'll make plans...before you totally hate me". He asked when I would be getting up and i said probably around 11 and he said ok i'll call you then and we'll make plans. It is now 1pm and I've still not heard from him. So wtf? He told me last night that he was very sorry and blah blah blah. But I'm thinking maybe he just thinks i totally hate him now and dont want to have anything to do with him. But that still doesn't excuse it. You dont do that shit, you do what you say you're going to do. He could have at least called and been like "I dont want to go out today" or something. Dammit.

This is why I hate dating.

So...

Joe called me last night wanting to know if I wanted to go out tanight which i said i had plans cuz well...I DID! So I'm thinking about calling him back and saying "hey you want to do something tonight?" I didn't want to go out with him till I saw how things went with Clayton because I wanted to give him a fair shot cuz hes a kewl guy, but if hes going to blow me off I'm not going to sit around the house sulking.

Oh well, we'll see what happens.

Christmas this year had a lot of ups and downs....thankfully a lot more ups than downs. Yesterday I went to my dads. He cooked soooooooooo much food and we had a client of his and her boyfriend over and my step-grandpa over. It was kewl. I gave dad his presents. I got him a MP3 player, a Honda money clip, a collectors S2000 book, a car mag, and some candy. He loved it. w00t!

Last night I went over to Brandi's and gave her her presents. I think she liked'em pretty good. I got her some cooking stuff and a Snowbaby. That Snowbaby kicked ass...I think I'm going to start collecting them. Clayton and Ryan came over and we watched Spiderman 2 and Ryan did some magic tricks (they were awesome man...I was impressed) and we ended up leaving at like 4am. I'm still exhausted....but it was an awesome night.

Alright so I got home around 4:30 this morning...thinking HEY i can get a whole 5 hours or so sleep before the kids get up and we open presents...WRONG. I woke up at 9:30 and they had already opened presents without me. I was so pissed. That really hurt my feelings. Aparantly they had left the presents I had gotten them, mom and bob, for when I woke up. But everything else was opened. I was bummed...but whatever.

The day, however, got much better. My mom loved the stuff I got her and so did Bob so all was well. I had an awesome time seeing all of my family. There was SO much food...omg, I'm sick. I think everyone had a good time. w00t!

I got some really kewl presents this year. Here are a few....

kickass new shirts

Victoria's Secret "Heavenly" perfume and lotion with Molly

yessss! such an awesome game

my Honda watch

New ponies...Banjo Blue, Flutter Butter, Tropical Delight, Princess Peppermint (all Toys R Us exclusives) and I made a new custom that doesn't have a name yet, but shes kewl.

new puter desk and chair. no more nightstand! haha w00t

and monies!

Alright...can someone tell me the sense in marrying someone just because they're pregnant? I'm sorry, but I think its dumb. I realize a lot of people do it for the 'sake of the child' but I mean honestly...think about it. If you dont want to marry the person BEFORE they get pregnant...what the hell makes you think its going to be any better with a kid? It will only be worse. Kids are a lot of stress. Trust me, I KNOW this all too well. It just blows my mind. But oh well....not my place to say so I guess. I just found out that the wedding colors are black, white, and baby pink. Yea...at one point I wanted a winter wedding. Know what my colors were going to be? Red and navy. But black??? Isn't that a bit morbid for a wedding? Oh well, least I can wear black to the wedding now and not feel guilty. w00t! Actually talked to my mom about me having a beach wedding. She thought it was a stoopid idea. I <3 her so much.

I wrapped all of my xmas presents tonight! It was fun. I'm all drinkin some egg nog and bitchin bout things that have nothing to do with me. Talk about the christmas spirit! I'm becoming a lil bit of a scrooge. Or possibly not quite a scrooge, just a grump. Its just that everything has been annoying me 100x's more now for some unearthly reason. Imagine that.

I've got to be at work at 6:30 in the morning which means I'm going to have to get up at 5:30 cuz the only way I'm going to be even HALF way awake tomorrow is if I take a shower. And theres no way in hell Im getting up before 5:30. Its going to be a pain in the ass to pull THAT off. Bleh. I'll probably be a few minutes late, but hey...maybe they wont notice. We dont open till 7. w00t!

My dad told me tonight that he can't get me the one thing I wanted for xmas. Okay, before I sound like a spoiled brat...it was just a PS2 game. Silent Hill 4 to be exact...yes the one I've been going crazy over. Its actually  not that big of a deal but I specifically remember he and I going to walmart a month and a half ago and me telling him "oh look dad, theres only 4 left". Now hes like "im sorry shel, but everyones sold out of SH4". He wanted to get me a jewelry box instead. *sigh* poor dad. bless his heart.

I feel kind of good actually. Lifes looking up a little. I've got a lot to look forward to. Like being super bizzy this week, I'm working 4 days...all mornings so i'll get off early....me and brandi are going to a xmas party tomorrow night, i've got that wedding to do on sunday, xmas @ my dads, xmas @ my house, and I'd like to squeeze hanging out with Joe somewhere in there, and of course, my wonderful Linz.

So anyway! i need to be getting my happy ass in bed or something, so I'l post some of my most recent pix and call it a night cuz God knows 3 LJ posts in one day is beyond sane. =P

Yes, I <3 my new silver glittery cat eye sunglasses. :)

Okay, when is this guy gonna get a clue. I just got another letter from him. It was sent from some Nathan guy in Georgia...WTF. I didn't know who it was from. I went and read it and it had 2 pictures of me in it. The letter basically said "sorry to bother you blah blah blah here are some pictures i just found, thought you might want them blah blah blah" but it had his address and everything in it, like im going to fucking write the asshole. Stoopid ass....the whole picture thing was lame. like i want to be reminded of that fucking time in my life. I hate him. I honestly do. I hope he dies.

 

IT HAS BEEN OVER A YEAR SINCE WE BROKE UP! uuuuuuughhhhhhh! Leave me the fuck alone dude.

aight, so lets see...wtf has been going on with me since i last posted....oh yea...

 

FINALS ARE OVER!!!!!!!

 

Thank you God!! best news of my entire life. this has by far been the hardest semester to get through since i've been in college...not cuz the work but because i'm so freakin burnt out its rediculous. so im going to enjoy a nice month off with no distractions. w00t! i've got some kewl stuff planned. christmas is gonna be awesome. my cousin is getting married this sunday...aight that isn't kewl...will explain later...but i love weddings! and me bran and the girls are going partying for new years! hell yes. i'm excited. ive still gotta couple xmas presents i gotta get. i'm going to get dad a creeper for xmas that turns into a stool and im going to get bob....hell i dont know wtf im going to get bob. i was thinking about a new set of screwdrivers or something consider he ALWAYS friginn loses his shit, but then again its because he doesn't take care of anything. ahhh yes.

so! this about my cousin getting married...hes a delinquint...he really is...always in trouble, not in school...just...trouble. but i <3 him to death. he and i used to be very very close. hes 19...and hes getting married. which im TOTALLY against. i know this is going to make me sound so stuck up but my gah...his g/f/fiance wtf ever is not very cute...she has NO style whatsoever and wears some of the CHEESIEST looking shit like leopard print boots with a matching purse. omfg gag me. so nasty. she wore that w/a button down white shirt that was 2 sizes too small and showed off her belly button to our xmas party last year. i bout died. which you know. granted, she might be hella sweet or something but lord...im a bit disappointed in glenn. hes overall a pretty goodlooking guy and shes just...ugh...i dont even know her name.

Whatever...im so against marriage...especially if you're under 30.

ok so i'm a dumbass and didn't post the email i sent him...i just saw where he emailed me back...here they both are...

I know I left you a voicemail but I just wanted to say a few things.
If you're wanting/working on getting back together with your ex, its
not going to upset me. You and I were never very serious. Yea, it bums
me a little, but i'll get over it. I just wish you'd let me know.

You've said in the past that you wanted to be straight forward and
honest with eachother, and I have been with you. I dont understand why
you would suddenly just blow me off when I thought we were kewl with
eachother.

Sunday night you gave me a hug and told me you'd call me after work
the next day and everything was kewl...that was the last time I heard
from you. Please look at it from my point of view. I dont know whether
to be agrivated because you're possibly trying to blow me off because
you're trying to get back with your ex, if you're just wanting time
alone possibly because you're stressed, or for some other reason.
Needless to say, I would consider you a friend of mine, and I'm a
little bit worried about you.

At this point, I dont know if i'll  hear from you again. My best guess
is you're probably talking to her again and probably thinking you dont
need me because I will jeopardize you're relationship with her. All I
ask if for a email, IM, phone call or something to just let me know
whats going on. If you dont want to talk to me again after that,
alright, but you owe me that much after weeks of talking every day and
honestly liking you as a person and caring about you.

I'm not mad, i'm just disappointed because you're choosing to avoid me
instead of being straight up with me. I would rather know the truth,
no matter what it is, than go on not knowing why you're not speaking
to me.

Shel

and here is the one from him...

hey,
 i'm sorry i've been avoiding you, but i just can't handle anymore stress in my life right now and after the way that you left the other night, quiet frankly it kinda rubbed me the wrong way, and i just cant handle things that that right now. i'm sorry that we met when we did on not in sometime in the future things might have been different, but i just really need time alone with myself  to deal with issues in my life that i need to get straightened out and thats something that noone can help me with, this is just how i have always dealt with things and probably will be til the day i die. again im sorry for ignoring you i just needed time alone to decide how i was going to deal with things.
 
 
Note: if you're wondering how exactly i left sunday night....he had been text messaging this person...who i assumed was his ex (still dont fucking know who it was) pretty much the entire night....last 15 minutes i was there he puts his arm around me....i get up to leave just expecting him to say bye i'll talk to you later and he gives me a hug and a kiss....so im like ok wtf is going on...are you just playing with me or what...thats what was going through my mind...so he gives me a hug...we kiss...and i spun around real fast and bolted out the door. moreso because  i didn't know what to think and partly cuz i was pissed. you dont go and text message someone in front of someone without saying SOMETHING about who it is. hello...i even asked him on the way into walmart (this being the second time he'd gotten a text message from her that night) if it was her and he never replied. so wtf was i suppose to think? anyway, i felt really bad about it on the way home. and monday night i left him a voicemail apologizing for leaving the way i did.

You know...my life right now is more shitty than it has been in a very long time.

I will never...NEVER understand guys. Rocky has been avoiding me since sunday...the thing is...get this...I see him sunday night...we hang out for like 3 hours like usual, things go good as usual, EXCEPT the fact that hes text messaging someone on his phone 2 or 3 diff times during that period. I go to leave, he gives me a hug and a kiss, and said be careful and that he'd call me monday after work. THATS THE LAST FUCKING TIME I'VE TALKED TO HIM!! What the fuck..ok i realize that a) he was probably talking to his ex b)if they're trying to get back together or whatever that i would pose a problem and hes probably not wanting to risk it but HOLY FUCKING SHIT we've talked everyday for the past like 3 weeks!!! we've hung out, talked on the phone for HOURS, shared our problems, and honestly i came to care about the guy...i liked him yea, hes attractive and all, but i cared about him. hes going through some rough stuff in his life and i genuinely cared. and here he goes...i've IMed him a total of like 3 times since sunday and hes not replied (one time he came back from idle to see who had imed him and then soon after went idle again) i've left him 2 voicemails and hes not called back and i just finished writing this email (will post) asking for a simple explanation. Honestly...i dont expect a reply whatsoever, but i sure as hell fucking deserve one. what i dont understand is he doesn't come off the kind of guy that would be like this at all. he was always very considerate, nice, and respectful to me. so what the fuck? All I have to say is, if this is what he wants, fine, it seriously doesn't bother me very much that hes probably wanting her back...i've already moved on and am currently talking to other people. i just feel like i deserve a fucking explanation. thats all.

how can you go weeks talking to someone and hanging out with them...being good friends with them...then suddenly say "fuck you" to them without any explanation?

Fuck you Rocky and you're fucking bitch of an ex girlfriend. She will probably treat you like shit and walk all over you just like she did last time. So good fucking luck.

I just want to say....

FUCK YOU, YOU MOTHERFUCKING ASSHOLE to....

  1. My Marriage and Family professor for fucking up my attendance this semster and putting me down for 19 days absent when i've only missed 4 but even moreso for being a total fucking dick about it. I hope you die a slow, miserable death and rot in hell for the rest of eternity.
  2. Stoopid ass motherfucking losers who think its ok to carelessly FLING your car door into someones car leaving a huge ass dent. I hope you fucking die.
  3. And while we're at it....Rocky, for not calling me in two days when you said you would, for ignoring my IMs and phone calls,  and for not being over your fucking bitch of an ex girlfriend who you're probably getting back together with now as we speak because youre a DUMBASS. I'm sorry i ever cared about you.
  4. Not to mention dumb people, arrogant people, naive people, and just fucking people in general. I hate the public.

Its raining today...i friggin hate rain.

Its depressing...

Me and Piaa are cuddling on my bed.

I <3 her.

She doesn't like the rain either.

She gets cold.

I want to molest Charlize Theron.

That is all. <3

Okay, as always...new pix...

I <3 my new hair.

^art, people

^my new kickass shoes

^yea, I didn't have sheets on my bed

Merry Christmas <3

I think I need Zoloft.

Or some kind of meds anyway...nothing is really wrong with me...I've just been kinda moody lately. I'll be totally happy, bouncing off the walls, then the next I'll be really down and shitty feeling. Kind of strange...maybe I should call Dr. B. Dr. B kicks ass. I got to thinking about that...I've gotta lot of doctors, or at least it feels like it. Dr. B, Dr. Guest, Dr. Wallace, Dr. Saunders, Dr. Russell. My lord...who needs a b/f when you have 5 men taking care of you, right?

I feel like I'm getting old. Okay, I know that sounds weird and stoopid considering I'm 20 and I know that isn't old but...I guess the correct thing to say is I feel like I'm growing up. Kind of getting sick of this dating thing...dating isn't bad, I just feel like I want something more. Thats scary. LOL I dont want to say I'm ready to "settle down" because thats just hellaciously scary to me...but I would like to finally get serious enough with someone that I'll feel confident in knowing I'll be with them for a few years, or maybe even marry them one day. I'm just tired of wasting my time with two month relationships. I hate it...you invest so much time,energy, and money in someone...much less all the emotional bullshit you put into it and then after a few months its like "sorry, you aren't my type". Fuck you, asshole.

I worked my ass off at work last night. I dropped a Cuisinart Grind N Brew Coffee Maker on my face last night...yea...right between my eyes...I had a headache from hell. I tripped over a 13" tv and have a bruise on my right shin. And I cut my finger on the plastic of a 80 piece Cambridge silverware set. I <3 my job. Its vicious. My boss, David, worked with me last night. Hes pretty kewl. I think I'm his favorite <3. He always asks me to do special things for him and work w/him on things. Haha. I'd almost think he was into me if it wasn't for the fact that a.)hes in his 30's and b.)he might be gay. Anyway, we did quite a bit last night, I'm sore. Can't wait till march when I can hopefully quit. w00t.

Today I'm actually off and its nice. No work, no school...but I've still got an assload of homework to do cuz my procrastinating ass hasn't done it yet and I've still gotta fit dad in somewhere and I'd like to go see Rocky if things go well today. We'll see.

I feel like being a hermit.

Ugh...

I have 2 and a half weeks of class left. A week and a half of class and a week for finals, and omfg...i am SO burnt out. The beginning of this semester was kewl...actually the first 2/3's of this semester I did fine and everything was going good but all of a sudden I started slacking BAD and now I'm behind and stressing. I've got 3 papers to write, one paper I have to partially redo, a math test to study for, finals to study for, and I STILL have to sign up for classes next semester and talk to my advisor. I hate school. Not to mention, I'm worried about starting at ETSU because I dont know wth exactly I'm going to be taking my first semester. I hate school...I HATE it.

Last night I went over to dads, I was stressin over school, stressin over social stuff, stressin over work...but I talked to him about it and now I feel a little better. (Now everyone say *awwww*). Kinda funny, I couldn't talk to mom about this kind of stuff. She doesn't really show emotion very much. Dad understands me a lot better. Its kind of nice.

My car is filthy, my room is a mess, I've got an assload of homework to do, I've not been out with my friends in weeks, and right now I'm sitting in a computer lab at school when I should be in class.

I cannot WAIT till December 18th.

I would just like to take this time to say, I love the Japanese. They kick so much ass, its unreal. Lets just take a minute to reflect on the wonderfulness that has came out of this tiny lil country.

  • Some of the most kickass cars in the world (next to Italy of course)
  • Some really brilliant people because they spend like 95% of their lives in school
  • Geisha girls
  • Japanese lanterns
  • Kewl rock gardens
  • Koi
  • Kickass architecture
  • ...and SOME REALLY KICKASS FOOD!!! (including those kickass fortune cookies that make me giggle)

Omg...I <3 this place. Japan has moved up the the #1 place I want to travel to now. I mean sure they bombed Pearl Harbor and all that sheeit but I mean C'MON those lil people are absolute geniuses!!

So whats brought on all this craziness? MOTO! Yes, the little Japanese place that has somewhat taken over my life. I've eaten Yaki w/no mushrooms for the past THREE days for lunch and I'm still not sick of it. I think my eyes are starting to slant...

But jeezus, I <3 this stuff. Nothing is better than some Yaki when you're absolutely starving.

Also, the fortune cookies are kewl. Such as the one that I got today, "Your happiness is intertwined with your outlook on life, in bed." (because EVERYONE knows you gotta add "in bed" to the end). How kickass is that?

I <3 the Japanese

^Tokyo

If i hear one more damn Democrat whining about the election I think I'm going to puke. KERRY LOST! If you dont like it, then tough. Thats life. The citizens have spoken and have made their decision...I just want to know how THAT many people could be wrong? Please...Bush must be doing SOMETHING right to win as many states as he did.

Also...I'm tired of hearing this "Oh, those pooooor pitiful soldiers sitting over in Iraq...they're miserable and definetly dont want to be over there..." Well NO SHIT they dont want to be over there...no one wants to be over there. But last time I checked, the draft was never reinstated was it? Therefore, those soldiers that are over there VOLUNTEERED to be in the military. When you join any form of military you're dumb to not think there may be the possibility of you going to war. Thats the reason we have military...for our protection. And no, I'm not being too harsh. I know many people that are in the military. Hell, my 34 year old cousin is getting ready to go to Afganistan for 18 months in a few days. Yes hes scared, yes hes not absolutely thrilled about going, but you know what? He wants to serve his country and do his job. Thats what he signed up for, and you know who he voted for? Take a wild guess.

*rme*

I'm so sick of the bitching. I dont talk about politics, I hate politics, if you ask me for my opinion...you wont get it unless you're a very close friend. I refuse to listen to Bush/Kerry bashing. But I will say this...the election is over, the votes have been counted, Bush will be around for four more years. If you dont like it...suck it up and pull your finger out of your ass. Support our country and be a freakin loyal citizen. I'm tired of the bullshit. If Kerry had won, I wouldn't be running around going "oooooh my, what will happen now...oh my gosh...Lord save us...".

Mellodramatic assholes...

Well...tonight for the most part was pretty normal. I went to dads after work...him my step mom and me went to proffitts to put some stuff on presale then we went to Cheddars...

Cheddars was PACKED so we ended up waiting about 20 mins outside. Everything was kewl. Then my phone rang...and it came up Blocked so I'm thinking wtf nobody has my number...So I'm curious and answer it and this is pretty much how it went...

Me: "hello"

Him: "...who is this?"

Me: "...who is THIS?"

Him:"I'm with the local KKK chapter and I want to invite you to a KKK Revival next week..."

Me: (I cut him off) "Sorry, I'm busy, maybe next week"

Him:"Alright, thats ok, I just need your name and address..."

Me: (I cut him off again) "Sorry, dont have a name"

Him:"You dont have a name??? hmmm..."

Me:"Yea, sorry dude"

Him:"hahaha, alright I'm sorry, i'm not with the KKK..."

Me:"Alright...well who are you?"

Him:"Do you know a David?"

Me:"No."

Him:"LOL Alright, do you know an Allen?"

Me:"...No..."

Him:"You dont?!"

Me:(gets to thinkin) "Oh yea!! Sorry...yea i know you"

I remembered I had talked to this guy from KP like twice on the phone named Allen...was suppose to meet him at 2nd Level one night and he had an RSX so I pretty much carry on a convo w/him about his car and us not getting to meet that time. this goes on for about 5-10 minutes. which keep in mind i've not talked to allen much and dont know a whole lot about him...then...

Me:"Hey...is your RSX a 5 speed or an auto?"

Him:"I uhm dont know...."

Me:"huh? i thought you were into cars? didn't your friend w/the miata teach you anything?"

Him:"........Ok, LOL I'm sorry...I'm not Allen...my name is Rob"

(here it takes me about a minute to understand wtf just happened in which time i go through a few "huh's" and "what?!'s" and "i'm confused...'s")

Him:"I honestly dont know who you are at all...I meant to dial my friend Sarah's number and when you answered you sounded cute so I thought I'd talk to you for a minute and give you a hard time."

Me:"You have got to be kidding me right?"

Him:"nah, im sorry...it was nice talking to you though. lol"

Me:"rofl...ok so where are you from??"

Him:"Around Knoxville...where are you from?"

Me:"haha...Kingsport"

Him:"really?? LOL thats kewl...how old are you?"

Me:"20..you?"

Him:"22...I bet you go to ETSU right?"

(this lil chit chat goes on for about 2 or 3 minutes then he says he has to go cuz they're going out tonight and he really does need to call sarah but that he would give me a call later so we could talk some more if it was alright.)

ROFL...WTFH? hahaha thats awesome...how funny...

=P
